answers.answer: Hi there!Well, without a clinical evaluation it would be difficult to determine the cause of your symptoms. Possibilities that may need to be considered include psychological issues such as stress, depression, neurogenic disorders, peyronie's disease, medications, alcohol, smoking, drugs/medications, hormonal imbalance, radiation therapy, kidney failure, metabolic disorders, multiple sclerosis, hypertension, diabetes, prostatitis, urethritis etc. You may consider getting this evaluated by a urologist for an accurate diagnosis and appropriate management.Hope this helps.Take care!
